description: Sets the channel to send a welcome card in.
extended: Running the command without providing a channel will disable welcome cards!
RESET: Successfully disabled welcome cards! New members will no longer trigger a welcome card upon joining.
NO_CHANNEL: You did not provide a valid channel!
SUCCESS: Successfully set the welcome card channel to `{CHANNEL}`! Welcome cards will be sent there.
VERY_FUNNY: Very funny... Provide a text channel ðŸ˜‰
